actions.name: Set result variant for at risk of malnutrition
Set result variant for normal nutritional status
Enable reason for creating care plan

#causesCardLabel.text: Select one or more possible causes in connection to the results.

[name='T1_has_food_intake_declined_over'.label: Has food intake declined over the past 3 months due to loss of appetite, digestive problems, chewing or  swallowing difficulties?

[name='T1_weight_loss_during_the_last_3'.label: Weight loss during the last 3 months

options.text: Weight loss greater than 3 kg (6.6 lbs)
Weight loss between 1 and 3 kg (2.2 and 6.6 lbs)
Able to get out/chair but does not got out

[name='T1_has_suffered_psychological'].label: Has suffered psychological stress or acute disease in the past 3 months?

[name='T1_body_mass_index_bmi'].label: Body Mass Index (BMI)
[name='T1_body_mass_index_bmi'].helpertext: (Weight in kg)/(Height in m)^2. If BMI is not available, replace the question with the Calf circumference question.

[name='T1_calf_circumference_cc_in_cm'].label: Calf circumference (CC) in cm
[name='T1_calf_circumference_cc_in_cm'].helpertext: Do not answer the question if the BMI question is already completed.

options.text: Preventing malnutrition in connection with care
To treat malnutrition in connection with care

#goalInformationText.text: **A goal must be selected to create a care plan.**

options.text: Adapt food to cultural and religious needs
Environmental adaptation for individual meal situations
Encourage and support your own food intake
Information and teaching on dietary issues
